title: Seven Forbid
description: Seven Forbid is a collection of short stories, a wickedly satisfying study in evil …Evil wears many faces in this chaotic world of ours.It often lives in the limelight, perhaps in the guise of a cold-blooded, haughty actress. At other times it can be less obvious, taking the form of a lustful old man, or his shallow, manipulative paramour. It is unnervingly close to us, evil, maybe even next door, where the neighbor is always drunk and his wife often sports a black eye.And sometimes—just sometimes—the façade of our daily existence is lifted, and the Devil himself makes an appearance …It would be wise to read these tales with the lights on.
author: Virginia  Wallace
